sentence.Network_en: Chu Kuei - ying stared dazedly at her mother for a moment , but said nothing.
sentence.Network_cn: 朱桂英怔怔地望着她母亲, 不作声.

sentence.Network_en: He wondered dazedly whether the term after next at his new school wouldn't matter so much.
sentence.Network_cn: 他昏头昏脑地想,不知道新学校的第三个学期是不是不那么重要.
